'''''Waveriding Adventurer (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (II)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete 6 Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Liffey Region]] and the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]].
